settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Shipping

All orders ship within 1-2 business days via USPS or UPS. Delivery typically takes 3-5 business days within the United States. International shipping is available to select countriesâ€”check at checkout for availability and rates.

Free shipping on all orders over $75.

Returns & Refunds

We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your first Sloe Fit order, contact us within 30 days of delivery for a full refund.

To initiate a return, email support@sloefit.com with your order number and reason for return.

Damaged or Defective Products

If your order arrives damaged or defective, contact us immediately with photos. We'll send a replacement at no charge.
